verses.verse: Then <WG5119> was Yeshuw`a <WG2424> led up <WG321> <WG5681> of <WG5259> the Spirit <WG4151> into <WG1519> the wilderness <WG2048> to be tempted <WG3985> <WG5683> of <WG5259> the devil <WG1228>.
And <WG2532> when he had fasted <WG3522> <WG5660> forty <WG5062> days <WG2250> and <WG2532> forty <WG5062> nights <WG3571>, he was afterward <WG5305> an hungred <WG3983> <WG5656>.

And <WG2532> when the tempter <WG3985> <WG5723> came <WG4334> <WG5631> to him <WG846>, he said <WG2036> <WG5627>, If <WG1487> thou be <WG1488> <WG5748> the Son <WG5207> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, command <WG2036> <WG5628> that <WG2443> these <WG3778> stones <WG3037> be made <WG1096> <WG5638> bread <WG740>.

But <WG1161> he answered <WG611> <WG5679> and said <WG2036> <WG5627>, It is written <WG1125> <WG5769>, Man <WG444> shall <WG2198> not <WG3756> live <WG2198> <WG5695> by <WG1909> bread <WG740> alone <WG3441>, but <WG235> by <WG1909> every <WG3956> word <WG4487> that proceedeth <WG1607> <WG5740> out of <WG1223> the mouth <WG4750> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.

Then <WG5119> the devil <WG1228> taketh <WG3880> him <WG846> up <WG3880> <WG5719> into <WG1519> the holy <WG40> city <WG4172>, and <WG2532> setteth <WG2476> <WG5719> him <WG846> on <WG1909> a pinnacle <WG4419> of the temple <WG2411>,

And <WG2532> saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto him <WG846>, If <WG1487> thou be <WG1488> <WG5748> the Son <WG5207> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, cast <WG906> <WG5628> thyself <WG4572> down <WG2736>: for <WG1063> it is written <WG1125> <WG5769>, <WG3754> He shall give <WG1781> his <WG846> angels <WG32> charge <WG1781> <WG5699> concerning <WG4012> thee <WG4675>: and <WG2532> in <WG1909> their hands <WG5495> they shall bear <WG142> thee <WG4571> up <WG142> <WG5692>, lest at any time <WG3379> thou dash <WG4350> <WG5661> thy <WG4675> foot <WG4228> against <WG4314> a stone <WG3037>.

Yeshuw`a <WG2424> said <WG5346> <WG5713> unto him <WG846>, It is written <WG1125> <WG5769> again <WG3825>, Thou shalt <WG1598> not <WG3756> tempt <WG1598> <WG5692> the YY <WG2962> thy <WG4675> 'Elohim <WG2316>.

Again <WG3825>, the devil <WG1228> taketh <WG3880> him <WG846> up <WG3880> <WG5719> into <WG1519> an exceeding <WG3029> high <WG5308> mountain <WG3735>, and <WG2532> sheweth <WG1166> <WG5719> him <WG846> all <WG3956> the kingdoms <WG932> of the world <WG2889>, and <WG2532> the glory <WG1391> of them <WG846>;

And <WG2532> saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto him <WG846>, All <WG3956> these things <WG5023> will I give <WG1325> <WG5692> thee <WG4671>, if <WG1437> thou wilt fall down <WG4098> <WG5631> and worship <WG4352> <WG5661> me <WG3427>.

Then <WG5119> saith <WG3004> <WG5719> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> unto him <WG846>, Get thee hence <WG5217> <WG5720>, Satan <WG4567>: for <WG1063> it is written <WG1125> <WG5769>, Thou shalt worship <WG4352> <WG5692> the YY <WG2962> thy <WG4675> 'Elohim <WG2316>, and <WG2532> him <WG846> only <WG3441> shalt thou serve <WG3000> <WG5692>.

Then <WG5119> the devil <WG1228> leaveth <WG863> <WG5719> him <WG846>, and <WG2532>, behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, angels <WG32> came <WG4334> <WG5656> and <WG2532> ministered <WG1247> <WG5707> unto him <WG846>.
Now <WG1161> when Yeshuw`a <WG2424> had heard <WG191> <WG5660> that <WG3754> Yochanan <WG2491> was cast into prison <WG3860> <WG5681>, he departed <WG402> <WG5656> into <WG1519> the Galil <WG1056>;

And <WG2532> leaving <WG2641> <WG5631> Natzeret <WG3478>, he came <WG2064> <WG5631> and dwelt <WG2730> <WG5656> in <WG1519> K'far-Nachum <WG2584>, which <WG3588> is upon the sea coast <WG3864>, in <WG1722> the borders <WG3725> of Zabulon <WG2194> and <WG2532> Nephthalim <WG3508>:
That <WG2443> it might be fulfilled <WG4137> <WG5686> which <WG3588> was spoken <WG4483> <WG5685> by <WG1223> Esaias <WG2268> the prophet <WG4396>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>,

The land <WG1093> of Zabulon <WG2194>, and <WG2532> the land <WG1093> of Nephthalim <WG3508>, by the way <WG3598> of the sea <WG2281>, beyond <WG4008> Yarden <WG2446>, the Galil <WG1056> of the goyim <WG1484>;

The people <WG2992> which <WG3588> sat <WG2521> <WG5740> in <WG1722> darkness <WG4655> saw <WG1492> <WG5627> great <WG3173> light <WG5457>; and <WG2532> to them which <WG3588> sat <WG2521> <WG5740> in <WG1722> the region <WG5561> and <WG2532> shadow <WG4639> of death <WG2288> light <WG5457> is sprung up <WG393> <WG5656> <WG846>.

From <WG575> that time <WG5119> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> began <WG756> <WG5662> to preach <WG2784> <WG5721>, and <WG2532> to say <WG3004> <WG5721>, Repent <WG3340> <WG5720>: for <WG1063> the kingdom <WG932> of heaven <WG3772> is at hand <WG1448> <WG5758>.

And <WG1161> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>, walking <WG4043> <WG5723> by <WG3844> the sea <WG2281> of the Galil <WG1056>, saw <WG1492> <WG5627> two <WG1417> brethren <WG80>, SHim`on <WG4613> called <WG3004> <WG5746> Kefa <WG4074>, and <WG2532> Andrew <WG406> his <WG846> brother <WG80>, casting <WG906> <WG5723> a net <WG293> into <WG1519> the sea <WG2281>: for <WG1063> they were <WG2258> <WG5713> fishers <WG231>.
And <WG2532> he saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto them <WG846>, Follow <WG1205> <WG5773> <WG3694> me <WG3450>, and <WG2532> I will make <WG4160> <WG5692> you <WG5209> fishers <WG231> of men <WG444>.
And <WG1161> they straightway <WG2112> left <WG863> <WG5631> their nets <WG1350>, and followed <WG190> <WG5656> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> going on <WG4260> <WG5631> from thence <WG1564>, he saw <WG1492> <WG5627> other <WG243> two <WG1417> brethren <WG80>, Ya`akov <WG2385> the son of <WG3588> Zavdai <WG2199>, and <WG2532> Yochanan <WG2491> his <WG846> brother <WG80>, in <WG1722> a ship <WG4143> with <WG3326> Zavdai <WG2199> their <WG846> father <WG3962>, mending <WG2675> <WG5723> their <WG846> nets <WG1350>; and <WG2532> he called <WG2564> <WG5656> them <WG846>.
And <WG1161> they immediately <WG2112> left <WG863> <WG5631> the ship <WG4143> and <WG2532> their <WG846> father <WG3962>, and followed <WG190> <WG5656> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> went about <WG4013> <WG5707> all <WG3650> the Galil <WG1056>, teaching <WG1321> <WG5723> in <WG1722> their <WG846> synagogues <WG4864>, and <WG2532> preaching <WG2784> <WG5723> the gospel <WG2098> of the kingdom <WG932>, and <WG2532> healing <WG2323> <WG5723> all <WG3956> manner of sickness <WG3554> and <WG2532> all <WG3956> manner of disease <WG3119> among <WG1722> the people <WG2992>.

And <WG2532> his <WG846> fame <WG189> went <WG565> <WG5627> throughout <WG1519> all <WG3650> Syria <WG4947>: and <WG2532> they brought <WG4374> <WG5656> unto him <WG846> all <WG3956> sick <WG2560> people <WG2192> <WG5723> that were taken with <WG4912> <WG5746> divers <WG4164> diseases <WG3554> and <WG2532> torments <WG931>, and <WG2532> those which were possessed with devils <WG1139> <WG5740>, and <WG2532> those which were lunatick <WG4583> <WG5740>, and <WG2532> those that had the palsy <WG3885>; and <WG2532> he healed <WG2323> <WG5656> them <WG846>.

And <WG2532> there followed <WG190> <WG5656> him <WG846> great <WG4183> multitudes of people <WG3793> from <WG575> the Galil <WG1056>, and <WG2532> from Decapolis <WG1179>, and <WG2532> from Yerushalayim <WG2414>, and <WG2532> from Judaea <WG2449>, and <WG2532> from beyond <WG4008> Yarden <WG2446>.
